attributes.action: introduce a law to make it a legal requirement to have all/any/every dog on a suitable and substantial lead/harness in public places at all times, with exception  for specified dog runs.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Dog owners are generally decent people. But with the increased wave of small violent dogs, those used by some as 'Status Symbols', has come a tendancy to not put them on leads in public places. Amazingly I have come across some who do not even have a lead for their dog.
It's not about your dog being dangerous or violent, it's just aboutcommon courtesy and manners. My dog was in season recently and the amount of dogs I had to fend off with my foot was appalling.
